channel.title: Steve Cohen
channel.description: Steve Cohen President, Screen Machine Industries, Inc., Etna, Ohio (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: My name is Steven Cohen and I am president of Screen Machine Industries, a family-owned manufacturer of construction and mining equipment located in the great Buckeye State of Ohio.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: And, yes, we did build this company.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: Our country's nearly 30 million small businesses serve as the American backbone for job creation and product innovation.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: The opportunity to create new products and open new markets is the American Dream. This capitalistic spirit has supported our economy since its founding.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: As a manufacturer, our products are the heartbeat of our business.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: We can't tolerate other companies stealing our hard work without compensation.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: It can take several years and tens of thousands of dollars to achieve patent status. Once granted, we expect it to be protected. Our products are often stolen and copied overseas for a mere fraction of the price.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: All too often tariffs and unfair trade practices make it difficult for American businesses to export.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: We need a new president that will protect America's patented inventions, guard the value of our currency and open new markets for American products.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: American small businesses face a mountain of regulations and taxes.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: In addition, our international competitors do not have to face the upcoming costs associated with funding a multibillion dollar health care plan, overreaching emission standards, and the unnecessary "War on Coal." These factors create a tremendous disadvantage in the global market place.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: We need an administration that will lessen tax burdens and government regulations that strangle small businesses.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: While we face higher government-imposed costs, cheaper imports from overseas companies flood our markets.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: Unnecessary regulations and mandates imposed on business make our products more expensive to make and less competitive to sell.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: We need a Romney administration to ensure our country's competitiveness and give our companies the opportunity to expand and hire again.
item.author: Steve Cohen

item.title: Let's bring back that original American will to invent, employ and prosper!
item.author: Steve Cohen
